div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:11, 27 November 2009

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 07:37, 7 January 2007 (there is a middle red line appearing in the ying-yang))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:14, 1 March 2009

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 21:57, 24 August 2006 // This version has the most compatible colours as in the Mongolian Constitution. Sorry for the previous wrong usage.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:13, 1 March 2009

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 07:37, 7 January 2007 // This version has the most compatible colours as in the Mongolian Constitution.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:37, 1 November 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 07:37, 7 January 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 19:40, 31 August 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 21:57, 24 August 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 17:39, 24 August 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 17:33, 24 August 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 17:21, 24 August 2006

td.span: (exact draw of the symbol; if you disagree about the colours, please change them in this new file, but cf. http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Image_talk:Flag_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China.svg)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:12, 5 February 2006

td.span: (Removed small orangish circles at the top of the symbol)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:16, 3 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 03:41, 2 February 2006

td.span: (The middle strip is supposed to be sky blue)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:56, 31 January 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 20:40, 31 January 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 22:18, 21 December 2005

td.span: (Corrected colors. The flag is not orange and turquoise, but red, blue, and yellow.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 05:50, 28 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of Mongolia. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Mongolia)
